com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types

Class SimpleTypeSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.JsonSchema
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types.SimpleTypeSchema
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnySchema, ContainerTypeSchema, NullSchema, ValueTypeSchema

    public abstract class SimpleTypeSchema
extends JsonSchema
    This class encapsulates the functionality of JsonSchema simple types
    Author:
    jphelan
